page.title: 19TOURISM.
page.content: {Caravan Club Site}on New House Farm for Touring Caravans and Weekend Rallies. {St. Michaels College }hosts part of Three Choirs Festival. Also used for weekend music Courses and as a Field Study Centre. {Oldwood Common- }a large unfenced area used by picnicers, walkers and horseriders. Footpaths lead from it and criss cross the area. Used regularly by local Rambling Club and individual hikers. {Dog House Inn, Berrington,}has Bed and Breakfast accomodation, room for Pool, Darts and Air Gun Club. {Fountain Inn, Oldwood, }is well known for Good Food. Caters for Weddings, Parties,Dances and Dinners. Open all year round for Bar Meals. Has a Pool and Darts Team. Play Area for Children.
